title: FSorT: T227 Four baseball players, including Cobb (all psa)
author: Carter08

posts.post_title: FSorT: T227 Four baseball players, including Cobb (all psa)
posts.post_content:
Have all 4 baseball players in psa. Cobb is a really nice 2 and the other three are fairly ok 1s, at least for t227. I may hold onto to these and frame them but if anyone has been looking to acquire them definitely willing to talk. It’s either these or e93s - I wish I could do both but wife might not appreciate that. Thanks so much! Email me if interested in pics etc. Jim 

[url]jimmynonkes@yahoo.com[/url]
What do you want for the set?
Would rather trade for a t206 cobb but 8k is about the range where I’d part with the 4.

Can you post pics of the 4 cards? Front and back?

Sent from my SM-N950U using Tapatalk
Pics should be attached here. Apologies for the shadows.  Jim
Bump.  Leaving out trade thoughts and now looking to sell. 7750 net for all 4. PM me if interested. Thanks!

posts.post_title: Interested in just the cobb if breaking set.
posts.post_content: Pm if breaking the set of 4.
